PointSet class¶

When a subset of the PointSet is required, a subclass is set use PointSubSet class

class PointSet.PointSet(points, path=None, intensity=None, range_accuracy=0.002, angle_accuracy=0.012, measurement_accuracy=0.002, **kwargs)[source]¶

Basic point cloud

Mandatory Data (must be different from None):

__xyz (nX3 ndarray, n-number of points) - xyz unstructured Data (only 3D currently)

Optional Data (can be None or default value):

  • intensity - intensity of each point (ndarray)

  • range_accuracy: range measurement accuracy (default 0.002 m)

  • angle_accuracy: angle measurement accuracy (default \(0.012^\circ\))

  • measurement_accuracy: noise of modeled surface (default 0.002 m)

__init__(points, path=None, intensity=None, range_accuracy=0.002, angle_accuracy=0.012, measurement_accuracy=0.002, **kwargs)[source]¶

Initialize the PointSet object

Parameters

points – ndarray of xyz or xy

Optionals

Parameters

  • intensity (int) – intensity values for each point(optional)

  • path (str) – path to PointSet file

  • range_accuracy (float) – range measurement accuracy in m (default 0.002 m)

  • angle_accuracy (float) – angle measurement accuracy in degrees (default \(0.012^\circ\))

  • measurement_accuracy – noise of modeled surface (default 0.002 m)

PointSubSet class¶

class PointSubSet.PointSubSet(points, indices, path=None, intensity=None, range_accuracy=0.002, angle_accuracy=0.012, measurement_accuracy=0.002, **kwargs)[source]¶

Holds a subset of a PointSet

Provides the same interface as PointSet
